
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53171426">
<div class="parsedown-markdown"><h2 id="53171426_用处">用处</h2>
<p>对视频原声一键变声，隐藏原有的声音。</p>
<h2 id="53171426_工具">工具</h2>
<p>ffmpeg</p>
<h2 id="53171426_方法">方法</h2>
<p><code>ffmpeg -i input.mp4 -filter:a "rubberband=pitch=1.5" -c:v copy output_rubberband.mp4</code></p>
<p>将需要变声的视频和ffmpeg.exe放在同一目录下，然后在cmd中运行上述命令即可。</p></div>
<div class="parsedown-markdown-end_FLAG_ZXSQ" style="display:none"></div></td></tr></tbody></table>
